buildCommand: echo '=== ROOT BUILD DEBUG START ===' && pwd && echo '=== ROOT DIRECTORY CONTENTS ===' && ls -la && echo '=== RUNNING TURBO BUILD ===' && npm run build && echo '=== POST-BUILD ROOT DEBUG ===' && pwd && echo '=== LOOKING FOR ALL .next DIRECTORIES ===' && find . -name '.next' -type d && echo '=== CHECKING apps/web/.next ===' && (ls -la apps/web/.next || echo 'apps/web/.next not found') && echo '=== ROOT BUILD DEBUG END ==='
